successes.title: AMPY: Power your devices from your motion
successes.description: AMPY MOVE is a wearable device that captures energy from your motion and turns it into power to charge your phone or any USB-powered device

Pledges.description: Thank you so much for supporting AMPY! For every backer, TEAM AMPY will collectively burn 100 calories during and after our Kickstarter. Watch for exclusive updates, and see us transform our motion into usable energy with AMPY.
EARLY-BACKER: Be one of the first to break away from the outlet and produce your own power! Get AMPY for the EARLY-BACKER Kickstarter price of $75! Pre-sale price: $95.
Be one of the first to break away from the outlet and produce your own power! Get AMPY for the Kickstarter price of only $85. Pre-sale price: $95.
EARLY-BACKER ACCESSORY PACK: Get AMPY plus our 3-piece accessory kit for $95. Includes AMPY, protective sleeve, clip and armband. Pre-sale price: $125.
Get AMPY plus our 3-piece accessory kit for the Kickstarter price of $105. Includes AMPY, protective sleeve, clip and armband. Pre-sale price: $125.
AMPY 2-PACK: Get two AMPYs plus two accessory kits for only $195. Pre-sale price: $250.
FAMILY & FRIENDS PACK: Be a power-producing hero. Get five AMPYs and five sets of accessories for the whole family (and friends too). Pre-sale price: $625.
DISTRIBUTOR PACK: Ten AMPYs, all with accessory kits. Pre-sale price: $1250.

LAUNCH PARTY PASS PLUS: Get two AMPYs with two accessory kits, one of our pilot units before the production units ship â€” plus access to our launch party in Chicago. Date to be announced following Kickstarter. Airfare not included.

LAUNCH PARTY VIP ACCESS: Get three AMPYs with three accessory kits, and one of our pilot units. Plus enjoy two VIP passes to our launch party in Chicago including dinner with the team! Date to be announced following Kickstarter. Airfare not included.

CORPORATE SPONSORSHIP: Help Team AMPY transform portable charging! You'll receive ten AMPYs with ten accessory kits and your company logo on our website. Plus, we'll send you two of our pilot units before our production run ships, and four VIP access passes to our launch party in Chicago. Date to be announced following Kickstarter. Airfare not included.
